description: Beacon PeerDAS metrics according to the beacon metrics specs

panels.title: Data column sidecars submitted for gossip processing
Data column sidecars verified for gossip

targets.expr: sum by (instance) (increase(beacon_data_column_sidecar_processing_requests_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval])) - sum by (instance) (increase(beacon_data_column_sidecar_processing_successes_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval]))

(
  histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_column_sidecar_gossip_verification_seconds_bucket   {network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
OR
(
histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_column_sidecar_gossip_verification_milliseconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000
)

panels.title: Runtime of data column sidecars gossip verification

targets.expr:
(
histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_runtime_seconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
OR
(
histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_engine_getBlobsV2_runtime_milliseconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))  
)

panels.title: Runtime of engine_getBlobsV2

panels.description: Total count of reconstructed columns
panels.title: Count of reconstructed columns

targets.expr:
(
histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_availability_reconstruction_time_seconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
OR
(
  histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_availability_reconstruction_time_milliseconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000
)

panels.description: Time taken to compute data column sidecar, including cells, proofs and inclusion proof

targets.expr:
(
  histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_column_sidecar_computation_seconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
OR
(
  histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_column_sidecar_computation_milliseconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000 
)

panels.title: Time taken to compute data column sidecar

panels.description: Time taken to verify data column sidecar inclusion proof

targets.expr:
(
    histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_column_sidecar_inclusion_proof_verification_seconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
)
OR
(
histogram_quantile(0.99, rate(beacon_data_column_sidecar_inclusion_proof_verification_milliseconds_bucket{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) / 1000
)

)

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_unfiltered_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))

panels.description: Difference between number of gossip messages received from each topic including duplicates and deduplicated

targets.expr: sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_unfiltered_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval])) - sum by (instance, supernode) (increase(gossipsub_topic_msg_recv_counts_total{network="$network", supernode=~"$nodes", consensus_client=~"$consensus_client", instance=~"$instance", hash=~".*/data_column_sidecar.*"}[$__interval]))
